For people who love this, there is a second torrent, "Manly P. Hall, Complete Lecture Series - Part 2". Contains another 2.5 gig of his remaining lectures.

An excellent collection! MP Hall was a genius philosopher.

Here's the link I created for the Complete Lecture Two:

Thank you so much for uploading this! I've been looking for a long time for digital material by Manly, this is truly a gem!

Those interested in the real books of his check out the Philosophical Research Society: http://prs.org/index.html I highly recommend the Secret Teachings of All Ages in hardcover, you won't be disappointed!
Whoever submitted this, you are f*&king amazing.  I spent 7 years in university, but Hall's lectures were best education of my life, I spent 3 months in '09 listening to them.  Fantastic.
